Html:
Hi All,

I currently am using the previous version of the GMaps.Instance objects. When I ask for GetRoutesBetweenPoints it defatults to google maps. I would like to set that to Open Street. I am not using the control as this is in a console application. Can anyone help me in this matter.

Thanks in advance.

Thanks Radioman for getting back so quickly. I am looking for how to set the provider to OpenStreetMap in the version of GMap.NET I am using. The data on the GMap.Net files is 9/3/2011. I cannot seem to find where to either assign the provider or to use the class directly.

Thanks
use latest version,  i don't remember old stuff...
